title: Dharma Realm Guan Yin Sagely Monastery
description: Offers a buffet spread with around 15 or so dishes. Option for mix of salads and drinks. The public can participate in the chanting & recitation of the daily Ceremony Of Repentance Of the Great Compassion With A Thousand Hands and Thousand Eyes (Guan Shr Yin Bodhisattava) 12.30pm daily at the monastery. Buffet closes at 2pm when there is chanting ceremony. Location is a 5-minute walk from KLCC.
